title: Ezreal AP Ratio Nerfs
body:
Why did ezreal his AP ratios get nerfed? patch note states:

Q - Mystic Shot
RATIO 0.4 ability power ⇒ 0.3 ability power
W - Essence Flux
RATIO 0.6 bonus attack damage + 0.7 ability power

Previously W had an AP ratio of 0.8 and W now only hits 1 enemy so you nerf AP ezreal 3 times, 0.1 ratio on Q, 0.1 AP ratio on W and W only hits 1 enemy.

Whats with the nerfs? you seem to have this bad habit of nerfing or removing off hand builds of champions you rework

replies.body: I am frustrated by this as well. AP ezreal was one of the few champions I still played.
AP Ezreal lost a bit of raw damage versus champions in exchange for more damage versus structures and epic monsters, mana sustain, and better-feeling gameplay.
He also gained far better structure threat.

i im also frustrated my ap ezreal wass realy good  cud 1 shot any body with less thn 3k hp. now cant even 1 shot a adc plus is combo is so cluky u cant do (r-e-q-w) with ow having ur w dealing no dmg and dont get the kill and most likely die cuz u use ur e to deal dmg... i want the old w back
I am so confused by people. If you use to play him AP, now just play him AD or hybrid? he will still feel the same except now AOE on W, but now has sustain and high single target damage?
